Name: Emerald City Confidential™
About the game: Work with the world's most cunning detective in the shadowy underbelly of the Emerald City of Oz! As Petra, you'll be lured deep into mysteries involving new foes and familiar faces; Scarecrow, Lion, and Toto included. This is Oz as you've never seen it before! Solve your detective's quest and unravel a conspiracy of magic and intrigue! Follow a case through five chapters full of puzzles, witnesses, suspects, and allies. Over 50 beautiful and detailed environments to explore First PlayFirst game with full voiceover — 36 characters and over 6,000 lines of spoken dialog A new story and twist on the timeless world and classic characters of Oz
